insert into RECIPE
RECIPE_ID,
RECIPE_NAME,
RECIPE_IMG,
RECIPE_VIDEO,
CRAFT_ID, TASTE_ID,
USER_ID,
PEOPLE_NUMBER,
COOK_TIME,
PREPARATION_TIME,
POPULARITY,
DIFFICULTY,
INTRODUCTION,
COOKINGSKILL,
TIMESTAMP,
#{recipeId},
#{recipeName},
#{recipeImg},
#{recipeVideo},
#{craftId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{tasteId, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{userId},
#{peopleNumber, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{cookTime, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{preparationTime, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{popularity, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{difficulty, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{introduction, jdbcType=CLOB},
#{cookingSkill},
#{timestamp},
mapper.select: select r.recipe_id as recipeId, r.recipe_name, #{fastDFSPath} || r.recipe_img as recipe_img, r.recipe_video, r.CRAFT_ID, r.TASTE_ID, r.USER_ID, r.people_number, r.cook_time, r.preparation_time, r.popularity, r.timestamp, r.difficulty, r.cookingskill, r.introduction, e.EFFECT_ID, e.EFFECT_NAME, rs.RECIPE_STEP_ID, rs.RECIPE_ID, rs.STEP_CONTENT, #{fastDFSPath} || rs.STEP_IMG as STEP_IMG, rs.STEP_NUMBER, u.USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, USER_ICON, USER_EMAIL, USER_SEX, USER_INTRODUCTION, BIRTH, CREATE_TIME, c.CRAFT_ID, c.CRAFT_NAME, t.TASTE_ID, TASTE_NAME, m.MATERIALS_ID, m.RECIPE_ID, m.MAIN_MATERIALS, m.MAIN_NUMBER, m.MATERIALS_FLAG, #{fastDFSPath} || m.MATERIALSIMG as MATERIALSIMG from RECIPE r left join RECIPE_EFFECT re on r.RECIPE_ID = re.RECIPE_ID left join EFFECT e on re.EFFECT_ID = e.EFFECT_ID left join RECIPE_STEP rs on rs.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID left join "USER" u on u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID left join CRAFT c on c.CRAFT_ID = r.CRAFT_ID left join TASTE t on t.TASTE_ID = r.TASTE_ID left join Materials m on m.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID where r.RECIPE_ID = #{recipeId} order by rs.STEP_NUMBER ASC

select * from ( select t1.RECIPE_ID, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_IMG, POPULARITY, COOK_TIME, TIMESTAMP, stepNumber, userName, craftName, tasteName, effectName, ROWNUM as rn from ( select r.RECIPE_ID, r.RECIPE_NAME, #{fastDFSPath} || r.RECIPE_IMG as RECIPE_IMG, r.POPULARITY, r.COOK_TIME, r.TIMESTAMP, (select max(rs.STEP_NUMBER) from RECIPE_STEP rs where rs.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID) as stepNumber, (select u.USER_NAME from "USER" u where u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID) as userName, (select c.CRAFT_NAME from CRAFT c where c.CRAFT_ID = r.CRAFT_ID) as craftName, (select t.TASTE_NAME from TASTE t where t.TASTE_ID = r.TASTE_ID) as tasteName, -- 一个食谱有的对应很多功效，有的无对应功效，所以这里只取一个功效展示 (select e.EFFECT_NAME from RECIPE_EFFECT re left join EFFECT e on re.EFFECT_ID = e.EFFECT_ID left join RECIPE r1 on r1.RECIPE_ID = re.RECIPE_ID where r1.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID and ROWNUM = 1) as effectName from RECIPE r
and r.DIFFICULTY > 15
and r.DIFFICULTY > 12
and r.DIFFICULTY > 9
and r.DIFFICULTY > 6
and r.DIFFICULTY > 3
and (r.DIFFICULTY <=3 or r.DIFFICULTY IS NULL)
and r.COOK_TIME >= 2880
and r.COOK_TIME >= 1440 and r.COOK_TIME < 2880
and r.COOK_TIME >= 120 and r.COOK_TIME < 1440
and r.COOK_TIME >= 60 and r.COOK_TIME < 120
and r.COOK_TIME >= 0 and r.COOK_TIME < 60
and (r.COOK_TIME IS NULL or r.COOK_TIME < 0)
and r.CRAFT_ID = (select rc.CRAFT_ID from CRAFT rc where rc.CRAFT_NAME = #{term.craftTerm})
and r.TASTE_ID = (select rt.TASTE_ID from TASTE rt where rt.TASTE_NAME = #{term.tasteTerm})
and EXISTS (select rm.RECIPE_ID from MATERIALS rm where rm.MAIN_MATERIALS = #{term.materialTerm} and rm.MATERIALS_FLAG = 1 and rm.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID)
order by r.TIMESTAMP DESC
order by r.POPULARITY DESC
) t1 where ROWNUM <= #{page.current} * #{page.limit} ) t where rn > (#{page.current} - 1) * #{page.limit}

select count(*) from RECIPE r
and r.DIFFICULTY > 15
and r.DIFFICULTY > 12
and r.DIFFICULTY > 9
and r.DIFFICULTY > 6
and r.DIFFICULTY > 3
and (r.DIFFICULTY <=3 or r.DIFFICULTY IS NULL)
and r.COOK_TIME >= 2880
and r.COOK_TIME >= 1440 and r.COOK_TIME < 2880
and r.COOK_TIME >= 120 and r.COOK_TIME < 1440
and r.COOK_TIME >= 60 and r.COOK_TIME < 120
and r.COOK_TIME >= 0 and r.COOK_TIME < 60
and (r.COOK_TIME IS NULL or r.COOK_TIME < 0)
and r.CRAFT_ID = (select rc.CRAFT_ID from CRAFT rc where rc.CRAFT_NAME = #{craftTerm})
and r.TASTE_ID = (select rt.TASTE_ID from TASTE rt where rt.TASTE_NAME = #{tasteTerm})
and EXISTS (select rm.RECIPE_ID from MATERIALS rm where rm.MAIN_MATERIALS = #{materialTerm} and rm.MATERIALS_FLAG = 1 and rm.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID)

select * from ( select r.RECIPE_ID, r.RECIPE_NAME, #{fastDFSPath} || r.RECIPE_IMG as RECIPE_IMG, r.POPULARITY, r.COOK_TIME, r.TIMESTAMP, (select max(rs.STEP_NUMBER) from RECIPE_STEP rs where rs.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID) as stepNumber, (select u.USER_NAME from "USER" u where u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID) as userName, (select c.CRAFT_NAME from CRAFT c where c.CRAFT_ID = r.CRAFT_ID) as craftName, (select t.TASTE_NAME from TASTE t where t.TASTE_ID = r.TASTE_ID) as tasteName, -- 一个食谱有的对应很多功效，有的无对应功效，所以这里只取一个功效展示 (select e.EFFECT_NAME from RECIPE_EFFECT re left join EFFECT e on re.EFFECT_ID = e.EFFECT_ID left join RECIPE r1 on r1.RECIPE_ID = re.RECIPE_ID where r1.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID and ROWNUM = 1) as effectName from RECIPE r ) t where ROWNUM < 8 order by t.TIMESTAMP DESC

select * from ( select r.RECIPE_ID, r.RECIPE_NAME, #{fastDFSPath} || r.RECIPE_IMG as RECIPE_IMG, r.POPULARITY, r.COOK_TIME, r.TIMESTAMP, (select max(rs.STEP_NUMBER) from RECIPE_STEP rs where rs.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID) as stepNumber, (select u.USER_NAME from "USER" u where u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID) as userName, (select c.CRAFT_NAME from CRAFT c where c.CRAFT_ID = r.CRAFT_ID) as craftName, (select t.TASTE_NAME from TASTE t where t.TASTE_ID = r.TASTE_ID) as tasteName, -- 一个食谱有的对应很多功效，有的无对应功效，所以这里只取一个功效展示 (select e.EFFECT_NAME from RECIPE_EFFECT re left join EFFECT e on re.EFFECT_ID = e.EFFECT_ID left join RECIPE r1 on r1.RECIPE_ID = re.RECIPE_ID where r1.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID and ROWNUM = 1) as effectName from RECIPE r ) t where ROWNUM < 8 order by t.TIMESTAMP DESC

select * from ( select r.RECIPE_ID, r.RECIPE_NAME, #{fastDFSPath} || r.RECIPE_IMG as RECIPE_IMG, r.POPULARITY, r.COOK_TIME, r.TIMESTAMP, (select max(rs.STEP_NUMBER) from RECIPE_STEP rs where rs.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID) as stepNumber, (select u.USER_NAME from "USER" u where u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID) as userName, (select c.CRAFT_NAME from CRAFT c where c.CRAFT_ID = r.CRAFT_ID) as craftName, (select t.TASTE_NAME from TASTE t where t.TASTE_ID = r.TASTE_ID) as tasteName, -- 一个食谱有的对应很多功效，有的无对应功效，所以这里只取一个功效展示 (select e.EFFECT_NAME from RECIPE_EFFECT re left join EFFECT e on re.EFFECT_ID = e.EFFECT_ID left join RECIPE r1 on r1.RECIPE_ID = re.RECIPE_ID where r1.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID and ROWNUM = 1) as effectName from RECIPE r ) t where ROWNUM < 8 order by t.TIMESTAMP DESC

select * from ( select r.RECIPE_ID, r.RECIPE_NAME, #{fastDFSPath} || r.RECIPE_IMG as RECIPE_IMG, r.POPULARITY, r.COOK_TIME, r.TIMESTAMP, (select max(rs.STEP_NUMBER) from RECIPE_STEP rs where rs.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID) as stepNumber, (select u.USER_NAME from "USER" u where u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID) as userName, (select c.CRAFT_NAME from CRAFT c where c.CRAFT_ID = r.CRAFT_ID) as craftName, (select t.TASTE_NAME from TASTE t where t.TASTE_ID = r.TASTE_ID) as tasteName, -- 一个食谱有的对应很多功效，有的无对应功效，所以这里只取一个功效展示 (select e.EFFECT_NAME from RECIPE_EFFECT re left join EFFECT e on re.EFFECT_ID = e.EFFECT_ID left join RECIPE r1 on r1.RECIPE_ID = re.RECIPE_ID where r1.RECIPE_ID = r.RECIPE_ID and ROWNUM = 1) as effectName from RECIPE r ) t where ROWNUM < 8 order by t.TIMESTAMP DESC

select r.RECIPE_ID, RECIPE_NAME, #{fastDFSPath} || r.RECIPE_IMG as RECIPE_IMG, r.USER_ID, timestamp,u.USER_NAME, u.USER_ICON, -- 食谱菜单总数 (select count(*) from RECIPE re where re.USER_ID = u.USER_ID) as ordersCount from "USER" u left join ( select RECIPE_ID, RECIPE_NAME, USER_ID, RECIPE_IMG, ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY USER_ID order by TIMESTAMP DESC) as num, TIMESTAMP from RECIPE) r on u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID where num <= 5

select r.RECIPE_ID, RECIPE_NAME, r.RECIPE_IMG, r.USER_ID, timestamp, u.USER_NAME, u.USER_ICON from "USER" u left join ( select RECIPE_ID, RECIPE_NAME, USER_ID, RECIPE_IMG, ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY USER_ID order by TIMESTAMP DESC ) as num, TIMESTAMP from RECIPE) r on u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID where num <= 1
